page.title: 19SCHOOL IN THE PRESENT
page.content: The present school was built in 1948. There are 120 people in four classes. Most people walk to school,only a few of them go by car or cycle. If you're naughty you stay in at play time or miss your swimming .Most people have school dinners,a quarter have packed lunch and the remainder go home. Sometimes we have P.E in the hall . We have got a horse,stool,climbing frame and plank.Also we have a swimming pool which we use every summer.We hold 2 sport days every year,one is a school sport day,the other is one for all the schools in the Culm Valley.The school is also lucky enough to have a computer,T.V,& video.When you are 11 you can go to Uffculme by car or Cullompton by bus.
